Hymn.Arabic: " 34- لا تظنوا اني جئت لالقي سلاما على الارض ما جئت لالقي سلاما بل سيفا.
Hymn.English: 34 Do not think that I came to bring peace on earth. I did not come to bring peace but a sword.

Hymn.Arabic: 35- فاني جئت لافرق الانسان ضد ابيه و الابنة ضد امها و الكنة ضد حماتها.
Hymn.English: 35 For I have come to `set a man against his father, a daughter against her mother, and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law';
36 and `a man's enemies will be those of his own household.'

Hymn.Arabic: 37- من احب ابا او اما اكثر مني فلا يستحقني و من احب ابنا او ابنة اكثر مني فلا يستحقني.
Hymn.English: 37 He who loves father or mother more than Me is not worthy of Me. And he who loves son or daughter more than Me is not worthy of Me.

Hymn.Arabic: 38- و من لا ياخذ صليبه و يتبعني فلا يستحقني.
Hymn.English: 38 And he who does not take his cross and follow after Me is not worthy of Me.

Hymn.Arabic: 39- من وجد حياته يضيعها و من اضاع حياته من اجلي يجدها.
Hymn.English: 39 He who finds his life will lose it, and he who loses his life for My sake will find it.

Hymn.Arabic: 40- من يقبلكم يقبلني و من يقبلني يقبل الذي ارسلني.
Hymn.English: 40 He who receives you receives Me, and he who receives Me receives Him who sent Me.

Hymn.Arabic: 41- من يقبل نبيا باسم نبي فاجر نبي ياخذ و من يقبل بارا باسم بار فاجر بار ياخذ.
Hymn.English: 41 He who receives a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet's reward. And he who receives a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man's reward.

Hymn.Arabic: 42- و من سقى احد هؤلاء الصغار كاس ماء بارد فقط باسم تلميذ فالحق اقول لكم انه لا يضيع اجره  "
Hymn.English: 42 And whoever gives one of these little ones only a cup of cold water in the name of a disciple, assuredly, I say to you, he shall by no means lose his reward.
